Recommendations: 1. Funds may be allocated for students conducting research activities to further motivate and encourage them to undergo said activity.
2. Conduct a seminar regarding the prescribed format in thesis writing for uniformity.
3. Proceedings should be made after each in-house review.
4. Deloading of subject to the faculty member conducting researches should be deloaded with academic courses.
5. Research outputs should be utilized for the welfare of the community and other clientele.
